com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate

Class LoadContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.LoadContext

  • public class LoadContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The context of a load or save operation to a single entity.

        public void setCurrentRoot(Key<?> rootEntity)
        Sets the current root entity

      • done

        public void done()
        Call this when a load process completes. Executes anything in the batch and then executes any delayed operations.

      • makeRef

        public <T> Ref<T> makeRef(Property property,
                 Key<T> key)
        Create a Ref for the key, and maybe initialize the value depending on the load annotation and the current state of load groups. If appropriate, this will also register the ref for upgrade.

      • makeReference

        public java.lang.Object makeReference(Property property,
                             java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                             com.google.appengine.api.datastore.Key key)
        Create an entity reference object for the key. If not loaded, the reference will be a simple partial (pojo with only key fields populated). If loaded, the return value will be a Result that produces a loaded instance.
        Parameters:
        property - is the property which will hold the reference
        clazz - is the type of the reference to generate, or base class of the result (in either case it is the field type)
        Returns:
        either a partial entity or a Result
